const Fetion_Personal * fx_data_get_PersonalInfo ( void   )

int fx_get_expirestime ( void   ) 

get the expires time of the fetion.

you should once the expires time to invoke the fetion_keep_alive functions to keep your fetion alive.

See also:
fetion_keep_alive
Returns:
the expirestime. if the expires time equal zero, you should quit fetion.

EventListener  func,
void *  args 
)

set the user how long day to receive the sms message.

Parameters:
day The day which you want to set, if day = 0, show will receive sms, or it is the refuse sms days. .
Returns:
non zero on successfully, otherwise return zero.

)

set the user state.

Returns:
